title: Balsamic chicken with mustard glaze
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets', 'Filling', '2 fresh tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 red onion, finely chopped', '4 teaspoons chopped fresh chives', '3 teaspoons balsamic vinegar (mix the balsamic in to taste)', 'Dressing', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar']
